articles.description: The malware is suspected to be a variant of CoverIm; the latter can steal data from various communication apps.
articles.content:
Cybersecurity experts have detected what they say is an alarmingly dangerous Android app, that can steal sensitive data, along with compromising users' privacy.
Representational Image
The app, they… [+1197 chars]

articles.title: How to Send an Instant Video Message on WhatsApp - MUO - MakeUseOf
articles.description: You can now send short videos on WhatsApp that work similarly to voice notes.
articles.content: WhatsApp voice messages are a convenient and expressive way to communicate without typing or calling. However, there are times when words alone may not convey what you want. You could record and send… [+2487 chars]
